TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThenBy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了一个方法，用于在应用 表达式之后，将排序表达式应用于 数据源对象。

span.span: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an data source object after an expression is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件中的表达式执行排序操作后, 可以使用其他数据字段上的类来执行后续排序操作。After a sort operation is performed by using the expression in the control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the class on a different data field. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何按 ListPrice 字段按降序对数据进行排序, 并使用类型按升序排序。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and then on the ProductID field in ascending order using the type. 此代码示例是演练中[提供的一个更大示例的一部分:使用声明性语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)筛选网页中的数据。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```

related.span: QueryExtender Web 服务器控件概述

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用 表达式的 对象的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the object to apply the expression to.

value.span: 要应用 表达式的 对象的属性。

span.span: The property of the object to apply the expression to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对指定数据字段上的数据进行排序。The sorts the data on a specified data field. 可以使用 集合对其他数据字段执行后续排序操作。Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the the collection. 此属性指定要应用`ThenBy`排序操作的数据字段。This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何按 ListPrice 字段按降序对数据进行排序, 然后按升序对 Product ID 字段进行排序。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and then on the Product ID field in ascending order. 此代码示例是演练中[提供的一个更大示例的一部分:使用声明性语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)筛选网页中的数据。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```

summary.span: 获取或设置 数据源对象的排序方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the ordering direction of the data source object.

value.span: 数据源对象的排序方向。

span.span: The ordering direction of the data source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在控件中用于按升序或降序对数据进行排序。The is used in the control to sort data in ascending or descending order. 排序操作的方向是使用属性指定的。The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性按降序对 ListPrice 字段中的数据按升序排序, 并按升序排序。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and on the ProductID field in ascending order by using the property. 此代码示例是演练中[提供的一个更大示例的一部分:使用声明性语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)筛选网页中的数据。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```
